entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34812.241 #73011

Updated

  • [feature request] Insight into what exceptions can reach a certain part of the code #71308
  • SyntaxTokenParser API Additions #73002

PullRequests

Created

  • Change all messages to pass back their checksum. Switch to callback … #73013
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add 'Make anonymous function static' feature #73012
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Move to collection exprs #73009
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to ToImmutableAndClear #73010
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use helper for creating KeyValuePairs. #73007
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Experiment with array creation. (part2) #73005
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused using #73006
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
